column2: Cubic Corp. is a technology provider of integrated solutions. The company is headquartered in San Diego, California and currently employs 6,200 full-time employees. The firm operates in three business segments: Cubic Transportation Systems (CTS) , Cubic Global Defense (CGD) and Cubic Mission Solutions (CMS). The firm's CTS segment is a systems integrator of payment and information technology and services for travel solutions. The Companyâ€™s CGD segment provides live, virtual, constructive and game-based training solutions to the U.S. Department of Defense, other U.S. government agencies and allied nations. Its CMS segment provides networked C4ISR capabilities for defense, intelligence, security and commercial missions.
